sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-btn @click="openModal">Agregar Marca</v-btn>
    <v-data-table :headers="headers" :items="brands" :loading="loading">
      <template v-slot:item.actions="{ item }">
        <v-btn @click="editBrand(item)">Editar</v-btn>
        <v-btn @click="deleteBrand(item.pK_BRAND)">Eliminar</v-btn>
      </template>
    </v-data-table>
    <BrandForm v-model="modal" :brand="selectedBrand" @saved="fetchBrands" />
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import { mapGetters, mapActions } from 'vuex';
import BrandForm from './BrandForm.vue';

export default {
  components: { BrandForm },
  data() {
    return {
      modal: false,
      selectedBrand: null,
    };
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapGetters('brand', ['brands', 'loading']),
    headers() {
      return [
        { text: 'ID', value: 'pK_BRAND' },
        { text: 'Nombre', value: 'branD_NAME' },
        { text: 'Estado', value: 'status' },
        { text: 'Acciones', value: 'actions', sortable: false },
      ];
    },
  },
  methods: {
    ...mapActions('brand', ['fetchBrands', 'deleteBrand']),
    openModal() {
      this.selectedBrand = { pK_BRAND: null, branD_NAME: '',status: 'ACTIVO' };
      this.modal = true;
    },
    editBrand(brand) {
      this.selectedBrand = { ...brand }; // Clonamos el objeto para evitar mutaciones directas
      this.modal = true;
    },
    async deleteBrand(id) {
      const confirmDelete = confirm('¿Estás seguro de que deseas eliminar esta marca?');
      if (confirmDelete) {
        await this.deleteBrand(id);
      }
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.fetchBrands();
  },
};
</script>
